column4: hello.  anyone here good with configuring wine with alsa? my sound doesn't work :(
are you using latest wine?
yes
wine --version = 0.9.54 ?
yes.  this is the output when i try to run winecfg -- "fixme:mixer:ALSA_MixerInit No master control found on M Audio Audiophile 24/96, disabling mixer"
wine --version = 0.9.54 ???
yes dude! I went to the website!
the sound works sometimes, i don't know how, but most of the time i just get that error message
maybe try adding this in /etc/apt/sources.list "deb http://wine.budgetdedicated.com/apt gutsy main"  && sudo apt-get update; sudo apt-get upgrade
Hm. what does this do?
might already be in there, lemme check
the budgetdedicated is a repo with the latest wine, probably built correctly
nah not there.  ok will try that now
it's not an ubuntu repo, so no, it won't be there
wine is the latest version
no such animal as grub.conf, afaik
there's /boot/grub/menu.lst
yes, but from where? did you build it yourself? my wine gives 0.9.49, which isn't latest
no I didn't build it. I went to winehq.com and installed the deb from there. 0.9.54
I'm positve its the absolute latest stable version.  I just know how to fix the alsa mixer problem.  Wine says it can't find the right "master control" for my card
*don't know
well try wine_0.9.54~winehq0~ubuntu~7.10-1_i386.deb
thanks for the help.  gotta go
